content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot
Perhaps due to this stdarch commit. (stdarch's submodule was updated in the last nightly.)

error: Undefined Behavior: calling a function with ABI C using caller ABI unadjusted
  --> /usr/share/rust/.rustup/toolchains/master/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/../../stdarch/crates/core_arch/src/arm_shared/barrier/common.rs:12:9
   |
12 |         super::isb(super::arg::SY)
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ calling a function with ABI C using caller ABI unadjusted
probably miri still implements that intrinsic as expecting the C ABI
